searchSql.baseSql:
<ifNotNull endTimeEnd> with wf as ( SELECT END_TIME_, W.CASE_CODE FROM sctrans.T_HI_WORKFLOW W INNER JOIN sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST taskInst ON taskInst.PROC_INST_ID_ = W.INST_CODE AND taskInst.task_def_key_ in ('LoanlostApproveManager','LoanlostApproveDirector') AND taskInst.ID_ = (SELECT MAX(ID_) FROM sctrans.ACT_HI_TASKINST WHERE PROC_INST_ID_ = taskInst.PROC_INST_ID_ and DELETE_REASON_='completed' AND task_def_key_ in ('LoanlostApproveManager','LoanlostApproveDirector')) ) </ifNotNull> select TotalForm.LOANTYPE AS MTYPE, TotalForm.IS_TMP_BANK AS MISTMP, COUNT(TotalForm.PKID) AS MCASES, SUM(TotalForm.COM_AMOUNT) AS MCOMAMOUNT, SUM(TotalForm.PRF_AMOUNT) AS MPRFAMOUNT, SUM(TotalForm.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT) AS MTOTALAMOUNT from ( select c.pkid, M.case_code, M.mort_type as MORT_TYPE_OLD, M.FIN_ORG_CODE, M.cust_name, ISNULL(m.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT,0)/10000 MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT, ISNULL(m.COM_AMOUNT,0)/10000 COM_AMOUNT, ISNULL(m.PRF_AMOUNT,0)/10000 PRF_AMOUNT, M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI, case when (select TOP 1 M.MORT_TYPE from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE MS where MS.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1) in('30016001','30016002') and (select TOP 1 M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE MS where MS.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1)=1 then '1' when (select TOP 1 M.MORT_TYPE from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE MS where MS.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1) in('30016003') and (select TOP 1 M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE MS where MS.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1)=1 then '2' when (select TOP 1 M.MORT_TYPE from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE MS where MS.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1) in('30016001','30016002') and (select TOP 1 M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE MS where MS.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1)=0 then '3' end LOANTYPE, M.SIGN_DATE, M.LEND_DATE, M.APPR_DATE, M.LOAN_AGENT, M.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM, (CASE m.IS_TMP_BANK WHEN '1' THEN '是' WHEN '0' THEN '否' END) IS_TMP_BANK, M.MORT_TYPE, M.CREATE_TIME, M.LOANLOST_APPLY_REASON
from sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE M left join sctrans.T_TO_CASE c on m.case_code = c.case_code where exists (select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_CASE c where c.CASE_CODE=M.CASE_CODE and c.LOAN_REQ=1) AND M.is_active = '1'
<ifNotNull idflag> AND M.LOAN_AGENT = #userId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND M.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM in (#queryorgs#) </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signTimeStart> AND M.SIGN_DATE >= #signTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signTimeEnd> AND M.SIGN_DATE <= #signTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull lendTimeStart> AND M.LEND_DATE >= #lendTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull lendTimeEnd> AND M.LEND_DATE <= #lendTimeEnd# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull propertyAddr> AND exists (select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO TP where TP.CASE_CODE=M.CASE_CODE AND TP.PROPERTY_ADDR like '%'+#propertyAddr#+'%') </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull apprTimeStart> AND M.APPR_DATE >= #apprTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull apprTimeEnd> AND M.APPR_DATE <= #apprTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull realhtTimeStart> AND exists (select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_HOUSE_TRANSFER where REAL_HT_TIME >= #realhtTimeStart# and REAL_HT_TIME <= #realhtTimeStart#) </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull endTimeStart> AND exists (select 1 from (select MAX(END_TIME_) as maxTime from wf) cwf WHERE cwf.maxTime>= #endTimeEnd# and cwf.maxTime<= #endTimeEnd#) </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull createTimeStart> AND M.CREATE_TIME >= #createTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull createTimeEnd> AND M.CREATE_TIME <= #createTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull transferTimeStart> AND exists ( select TOP 1 V.LAST_UPDATED_TIME_ FROM sctrans.ACT_HI_VARINST V where PROC_INST_ID_=(SELECT TOP 1 TW.INST_CODE FROM sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW TW WHERE TW.CASE_CODE=M.CASE_CODE AND TW.BUSINESS_KEY = 'operation_process' AND TW.STATUS in (0, 4)) AND V.NAME_='GuohuApprove' AND V.LONG_=1 AND V.LAST_UPDATED_TIME_ >= #transferTimeStart# AND V.LAST_UPDATED_TIME_ <= #transferTimeStart# ) </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull comAmountStart> AND M.COM_AMOUNT >= #comAmountStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull comAmountEnd> AND M.COM_AMOUNT <= #comAmountEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull mortTotalAmountStart> AND M.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT >= #mortTotalAmountStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull mortTotalAmountEnd> AND M.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT <= #mortTotalAmountEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull prfAmountStart> AND M.PRF_AMOUNT >= #prfAmountStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull prfAmountEnd> AND M.PRF_AMOUNT <= #prfAmountEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull isTempBank> and M.IS_TMP_BANK = #isTempBank# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull loanLostFinOrgNameCode> and exists (select 1 from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG FOCODE where FOCODE.FIN_ORG_CODE=m.fin_org_code and FOCODE.FA_FIN_ORG_CODE=#loanLostFinOrgNameCode#) </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull loanLostFinOrgNameYcCode> AND M.FIN_ORG_CODE = #loanLostFinOrgNameYcCode# </ifNotNull>
<if test=' isLose=="否" '> AND M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI=1 and (M.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or M.MORT_TYPE ='30016002' ) </if> <if test=' isLose=="是" '> AND M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI=0 and (M.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or M.MORT_TYPE ='30016002' ) </if> <if test=' isLose=="公" '> AND M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI=1 and M.MORT_TYPE='30016003' </if>
<ifNotNull processorOrgId> AND exists (SELECT 1 from SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB uj where uj.USER_ID=M.LOAN_AGENT and uj.real_name= #processorOrgId#) </ifNotNull>
<if test="organizeOrgId !=null and orgHierarchy == 'yucui_team' "> AND M.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM = #organizeOrgId# </if> <if test="organizeOrgId !=null and orgHierarchy == 'yucui_district' "> AND M.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM in (select id from sctrans.sys_org where PARENT_ID = #organizeOrgId#) </if> <ifNotNull loanType> and M.LOANTYPE = #loanType# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull caseCode> and M.case_code like '%'+#caseCode#+'%' </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull custName> and M.CUST_NAME like '%'+#custName#+'%' </ifNotNull> ) as TotalForm where 1=1
